title: PM Ranil Wickremesinghe sworn in as Finance Minister
body_lines: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has been sworn in as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stability and National Policies.
The Premier took oaths before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, at the President’s House in Colombo this morning.
Secretary to the President Gamini Senarath was also present at this occasion.
